arts.ttl: Conference League | Vitoria 1-1 Fiorentina: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina battled to secure a 1-1 draw against Vitoria SC in the Conference League, with Rolando Mandragora scoring a late equalizer to salvage a point for the visitors. The match saw Vitoria dominate the first half, creating several opportunities that could have seen them take a commanding lead.
